projects.head: travel
projects.title: REACT TRAVEL PROJECT
projects.content: This is a Front-end and Back-end separated, single page website developed with reactTs. Using the Ant-design for Page design .Using Redux,RTK for for state management, facilitating redux and achieving asynchronous ajax requests. CssModule is used to modularize css, establishing front-end routers by using react-router, and using axios to make requests.In addition,using redux-persist for persisting login information and i18n for language internationalization .Using express to develop the back-end data interface, and using jwt as the login authentication token.Using Docker for Container Deployment.Attention,the back-end is not connected to the database, so some functions cannot be fully implemented.

projects.head: article
projects.title: REACT ARTICLE PROJECT
projects.content:
This is a Front-end and Back-end separated, single page website developed with reactJs.Css3 and Csstransition are used to achieve the animation effect. 
Redux is used for state management,Using thunk to complete asynchronous request. Styled-component is used to modularize css, establishing front-end routers by using react-router, and using axios to make requests.Using Docker for Container Deployment.

projects.head: others
projects.title: OTHERS PROJECT
projects.content: Some other small website projects.For example, the crawler project, in which Echarts is used to make charts.Obtianed the development experience of reactTs and reactJs,through these projects.
